		Question: where is nineveh city
		Answer:
answer: Nineveh was an ancient city located in northern Mesopotamia, in what is now northern Iraq. It was the capital of the Neo-Assyrian Empire and one of the largest and most important cities in the ancient world. The city was destroyed in 612 BC by a coalition of Babylonian and Median forces.
